mapper.update: update wechatdata set deleteflag=0 where deleteflag=1 and latestDate between #{beforeDate} and #{currentDate} AND account =#{username}
mapper.select: SELECT headPicture,wxid,wxBiz,wxName,articlesNum,totalOriginalNum,totalReadNum,totalLikeNum,avgReadNum,avgLikeNum,avgHeadlineNum,qualityNum,influenceNum,latestDate, detail,di,ri,li FROM wechatdata WHERE deleteflag=1 and YEAR(latestDate)=#{year} and MONTH(latestDate)=#{month} AND wxBiz = #{wxBiz} limit 0,1

SELECT headPicture,wxid,wxBiz,wxName,articlesNum,totalOriginalNum,totalReadNum,totalLikeNum,avgReadNum,avgLikeNum,avgHeadlineNum,qualityNum,influenceNum,latestDate,detail,categoryId,categoryType,di,ri,li FROM wechatdata WHERE deleteflag=1 AND YEAR(latestDate)=#{year} AND MONTH(latestDate)=#{month} ORDER BY ri

select headPicture,wxid,wxName,wxBiz,articlesNum,totalOriginalNum,totalReadNum,totalLikeNum,avgReadNum,avgLikeNum,avgHeadlineNum,qualityNum,influenceNum,latestDate,di,ri,li from wechatdata where deleteflag=1 and YEAR(latestDate)=#{year} and MONTH(latestDate)=#{month} ORDER BY influenceNum DESC limit #{start},#{pageSize}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM wechatdata WHERE YEAR(latestDate)=#{year} and MONTH(latestDate)=#{month} AND DAY(latestDate)=#{day}
